item.title: What would Jesus do?
item.author: Thomas Ravalde,
item.description: Let the dialogue begin.’ So began Rory Fenton’s thoughtful piece last week – encouraging the religious and irreligious alike to ‘look for the common ground’ and ‘work together’ against extremism for a better society. As a Christian, I welcome this engagement from the (so called) ‘faitheists’ – it’s …
